title: Log in failed
body: Didn't play league for a month and now that i open my league, i can't login my account and im 100% sure that im putting my password correctly. can riot check on this account. IGN: WarZShock. i didnt change my password so how come i cant log in using my password. also i dont have access to my email thats why i can't change password.

replies.body:
I went ahead and checked on the backend to make sure your account hadn't been compromised, everything looks pretty safe right now! You might be entering the password or username wrong, so double check those. 

If you still can't get signed in, reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help after verifying that you're the original account creator.
